body:
#### PR description:
This PR should address the issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/40126 - tracking of a particle with very small negative kinetic energy. This issue should be rare, because never was reported below. The fix does not affect any physics.

PR validation:
private
title: [12.5] Protection for negative kinetic energy in Geant4 tracking
